global.title: RRE
global.description: B&B Group builds a better tomorrow, today.

sections.title: RRE POV
sections.description: Demystifying the conversations we're already having here at RRE and with our portfolio companies.  In each episode, your hosts, Will Porteous, Raju Rishi, and Jason Black will dive deeply into topics that are shaping the future, spanning from satellite technology and digital health to venture investing and beyond.
